name: Colour Adventure: Draw and Go
description:
Colour Adventure is a fun colouring and brain training game in one package!

Tap and hold the cube to colour a path to new places and countries.

Be warned! It’s not as simple as it looks or sounds!

Here’s why you’ll love Colour Adventure:
- Intuitive controls
- Simple gameplay
- Vibrant graphics
- Lots of maps to explore
- Minimalist design

Good luck on your travels!
